name: Tara and the Magical Typing Adventure
name_original: Tara and the Magical Typing Adventure
description:
-----------------------------------DISCLAIMER----------------------------

This game contain flashing lights that may cause temporary muscular convulsions. If you have ever experienced such symptoms, please do not play this game.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

I was looking around for games like Mario Teaches Typing, and met this game called Tara and the Magical Typing Adventure. According to their official website, the game reads:

"Tara and the Magical Typing Adventure is a 2D platform runner where you guide Tara, a little explorer, in order to avoid obstacles and pits to reach her destination by typing the correct key that each obstacle is assigned to. The more keys you get correct, the more confident Tara becomes. Therefore, she'll get increasingly faster until you reach your destination."

The game seems to have been canceled due to the devs being unmotivated to continue with the project. I managed to find a copy of the game in the comments of the website, but I didn't manage to go very far due to a few glitches and a pirate screen triggering all the time. I'm only sharing this here to spread more awareness of this game and hopefully show the devs that the game should keep going forward, even if what I have is a badly functioned build.

---Dev notes---

  1. All names mentioned here are not from real people, they're only here for story and immersion purposes. The original credits can be found at the end of the game.
  2. If you reached the end of the game, or would like to go back at any point, press p while in the title screen to "reset" the game.
  3. Another game dedicated to the third Luigikid creepypasta challenge, and probably no further development will be added to the game, other than bug fixes in the future.
